scripts.dev: npm run zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue "src/components/**/*.tsx" && concurrently --kill-others "npm run mitosis:watch" "npm run tailwind:watch"
scripts.build: npm run mitosis:build && npm run tailwind:build
scripts.mitosis:watch: chokidar "src/components/**/*.tsx" -c "if [ '{event}' = 'change' ] || [ '{event}' = 'add' ]; then npm run zx scripts/compile-mitosis.mjs vue {path}; fi;"
